topics.topicDescription: Learn about Banks and Credit unions

subtopics.subtopicDescription: Learn what are banks and difference between credit union and a bank

answerList.answerText: Banks are regulated by governments
Credit unions are only open to its members whereas banks are generally open to everyone
Members own the credit union and profit from its operations

quiz.question: How can bank be useful to you?

answerList.answerText: Bank can guide you in your career choices
Bank can help you save money
Bank can help you spend money

quiz.question: What is the main difference between credit unions and banks?

answerList.answerText: Credit unions are not for profit; banks are for profit
Credit unions are in smaller towns; banks are in larger cities
Credit unions have no ATMs; banks have ATMs

subtopics.subtopicDescription: Learn about different types of accounts at financial institutions

quiz.question: People can make deposits and withdrawals of money from both savings and checking accounts. Which statement is true?

answerList.answerText: Checking and savings allow you to perform deposits and withdrawls without any restrictions
Both type of accounts allows deposits and withdrawls but savings account restricts number of transactions in a month
Checking account is used for withdrawals and savings account is used for deposits

quiz.question: Your friend says he saves money in cookie jar at home because he is afraid that banks will spend all money wont be able to give him the money when he needs it. Which of the following reply will you give to your friend?

answerList.answerText: You agree with your friend and promise to gift him more cookie jars
You tell your friend that bank accounts are insured by government. If the banks fail, government will give his money back
You tell your friend that it is best for him to open a money market account which is safe

quiz.question: Imagine that you are running a pool cleaning business. Which accounts will you open and what will you use it for?

answerList.answerText: Open a money market account and put all my money in it. It gives higher interest rate and give me ability to transact
Open a savings account and save money in it since it gives higher interest rate

Open a checking account and a savings account. I will put some money in checking account so I can receive money from my clients and pay employees and vendors. I will stash away some money in savings account for a rainy day.

topics.topicDescription: Start to understand what is meant by Interest

quiz.question: Which of the following is not a form of borrowing money from bank

answerList.answerText: Use of credit card
Auto loan
Deposit money in an account

quiz.question: If I borrow $1000 and simple interest is 5%, after 1 year how much do I pay back?
What is the correct formula to calculate simple interest?

answerList.answerText: I = P*r*t
I = P + I
I = (p *r) / t

subtopics.subtopicDescription: Learn about special type of interest called compound interest

quiz.question: How can bank be useful to you?

answerList.answerText: Bank can guide you in your career choices
Bank can help you save money
Bank can help you spend money
Banks can help improve your grades

quiz.question: What is the main difference between credit unions and a banks?

answerList.answerText: Credit Unions have funny names; banks have serious names
Credit unions are in smaller towns; banks are in large cities
Credit unions have no ATMs; banks have ATMs
Credit unions are not for profit; banks are for profit
